alfred:
Hello! I'm here to help you order Little Delhi faster.

How to use me:
enterInfo: 1. Set up your user information like this: ```alfred info "John Smith, 0123456789"``` Remember to only use numeric characters for the phone number
placeOrder: 2. Place your order like this: ```alfred order "butter chicken (spicy), mango lassi, samosa"``` Note that you can specify a spice level in parentheses, leaving it blank just leaves it as default
orderFinished: 3. The order will be placed around 4pm, and one of the orderers will be chosen at random to receive the call for the food
extraActions: Some of my other features are:
favorite: - Set a favorite list of items so that you don't have to specify your order each time: ```alfred favorite "butter chicken (spicy), mango lassi, samosa"``` You can then place future orders with just `alfred order`. You can see your current favorite items by using `alfred favorite`
list: - See the list of available little delhi items with `alfred list`
showInfo: - See the info I have on file by using `alfred info`
orderFavorite: - Place your order from your favorite list by using `alfred order`
help: - See this help list by using `alfred help`
